creator: jodeleit@e-spirit.de
text:
The following xml does not result in a parsing error and the attribute value 
will equal "not fixed":

<!DOCTYPE TEST [
	<!ELEMENT TEST EMPTY>
	<!ATTLIST TEST
		fix CDATA #FIXED "fixed">
]>
<TEST fix="not fixed/>

When I run this document through sax.SAXCount with the -v option, I get the 
following error:

[Error] override.xml:4:24: Attribute "fix" with value "not fixed" must have a 
value of "fixed".

Did you turn on validation and register an error handler?
creator: zongaro@ca.ibm.com
jodeleit@e-spirit.de
text: my fault, of course it is an "error" and not a "fatal error" as i thought
